title: Forecast Workflow
text: Forecast workflow toolkit UHERO’s quarterly macro model. package wraps data preparation, equation management, estimation, simulation, reporting set reproducible R functions can called scripts, targets pipelines, interactively.

title: Forecast Workflow
text: Development scripts assume project opened RStudio (similar) working directory set repository root ::() resolves correctly.
code: # install dependencies declared in DESCRIPTION (fcutils, bimets, etc.) remotes::install_github("UHERO/fcflow")  # optional: restore the exact development environment renv::restore()

title: Forecast Workflow
text: Use fcflow::load_forecast_cfg() read active configuration. loader searches order: explicit path argument. Sys.getenv("MODDEV_CONFIG"). ::("config", "config.yml"). packaged default (inst/extdata/config/config.yml installed fcflow). Key sections YAML file: vintages: current (curr) comparison (comp) vintage labels. paths: locations raw/processed data, equations, figure output, helper scripts sourced via run_script_with_args(). Update entries relocate scripts inst/extfuns/. data_main, data_model, make_model, solve_model, plot_forecast, data_gets, select_model: module-specific settings controlling filenames, toggles (e.g., update_equations), date ranges, save locations. combine_equations: *_eq.txt files stitch together cache combined model_equations.txt / .RDS.

title: Forecast Workflow
text: exported functions accept configuration object produced load_forecast_cfg() can take pre-loaded data objects avoid redundant disk /O. combine_equations(cfg): reads BIMETS equation snippets located paths$equations, filters combine_equations$equations_subset, produces model_equations.txt .RDS. make_data_main(cfg, indicators = NULL): pulls history (either disk via fcutils::get_series_exp()), applies extend_script wrangl_script, writes data_main.csv/.RDS paths$processed. make_data_model(cfg, data_main, model_equations): restricts master set variables required model chains pseudo-exogenous series via impexf_script (default inst/extfuns/import_existing_forecast.R). make_model(cfg, data_model, model_equations): estimates behavioral equations (optionally discovering forcing TSRANGE), initializes zero add factors, records ragged edge metadata. solve_model(cfg, estimated_equations, exog_range, add0_factors): sources add-factor script (paths$addfac_script), runs BIMETS simulation, saves forecast.csv/.RDS plus add-factor log. plot_forecast(cfg, forecast, comparison_forecast, history): assembles history/current/comparison vintages, selects plot universe using tourism macro plot list script, writes interactive HTML charts paths$figures. function returns named list outputs can piped next step without needing touch filesystem.

title: Forecast Workflow
text: make_data_gets(cfg, data_main, existing_forecast): chains historical dataset pseudo-forecast create extended panel used GETS. Outputs data_main_extended.csv/.RDS. select_model(cfg, model_select_data, indicators): orchestrates GETS / ISAT workflow defined select_model config nodes, saves candidate equation (model_eq.txt), compiles estimates via BIMETS, produces diagnostic plots paths$figures. functions honor path conventions core workflow rely inst/extfuns/model_selection.R interactive experimentation.

title: Forecast Workflow
text: scripts inst/extfuns/ templates get sourced runtime: wrangle_data.R: apply data adjustments used live add-factor files (seasonal dummy tweaks, zeroing pandemic periods, derived ratios, etc.). extend_qmain_history.R: splice additional history archived AREMOS TSVs. import_existing_forecast.R: load QSOL/ASOL files, disaggregate annual series, construct real values, ensure exogenous drivers exist every equation. add_qmod.R: customize add factors prior solving model. qsol_plot_list.R / toursol_plot_list.R: define mnemonics appear macro vs. tourism dashboards. forecast_work.R: convenience script run subset workflow toggling booleans run_steps. Copy files locations referenced paths (point config copies inside inst/extfuns/) running package functions.

title: Forecast Workflow
text: Swap intermediate arguments NULL fall back previously saved artifacts disk.
code: library(fcflow)  cfg <- load_forecast_cfg()        # read config/config.yml or fallback equations <- combine_equations(cfg) data_main <- make_data_main(cfg)$data_main data_model <- make_data_model(cfg,                               data_main = data_main,                               model_equations = equations$model_equations) est <- make_model(cfg,                   data_model = data_model$data_model,                   model_equations = data_model$model_equations) fcst <- solve_model(cfg,                     estimated_equations = est$estimated_equations,                     exog_range = est$exog_range,                     add0_factors = est$add0_factors) plots <- plot_forecast(cfg, forecast = fcst$forecast)
